unnormalised: Oi, tuka khobor asli AIIMS-ant Dr. Verma gene editing-acher kainch bhonvlloi reasearch kortat mhunn? Dishtta tem genetic rog bore korpak sodhtat, zoxe, kaim favtti Huntington's pasun!
normalised: Oi, tuka khobor asa A-I-I-M-S hantuntlo Doctor Verma gene editing-acher kitlench tori chukichem research kortat mhunn? Dista tem genetic disease bori korpak sodtat, koxem mhonnlear, kiteak na Huntington's pasun!
text: Oi, tuka khobor asli AIIMS-ant Dr. Verma gene editing-acher kainch bhonvlloi reasearch kortat mhunn? Dishtta tem genetic rog bore korpak sodhtat, zoxe, kaim favtti Huntington's pasun!
